Key Match Events: Hakim Ziyech scored Morocco’s only goal in this encounter at minute 38, just before the halftime whistle.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Morocco will be facing next South Africa, which tied with Tunisia 0-0.
The Atlas Lions won their first game against Tanzania 3-0, and tied 1-1 against the Democratic Republic of Congo.
Others: Morocco’s win allowed Cote d’Ivoire, the host country, to qualify for the next stage too.
